name: waveform_trace
description: Represents a continuous, equally sampled observed or synthetic waveform trace. Most attributes are optional and can be used to describe either very detailed or fairly general provenance information.

attributes.name: seed_id
attributes.description: The SEED id of the recording station.

attributes.name: start_time
attributes.description: The time of the first sample in UTC.

attributes.name: number_of_samples
attributes.description: The number of samples in the waveform trace.

attributes.name: sampling_rate
attributes.description: The sampling rate of the data.

attributes.name: units
attributes.description: Units of the waveform data in a common abbreviation, e.g. `m`, `m/s`, `nm/s^2`, ...
